complete.nameSubtitle: This will be your visible name on Wispic
complete.nameNote: You won’t be able to change it later.
complete.nameNoteStrong: Heads up! This will be your public name and you won’t be able to change it later.
complete.birthTitleNamed: {{name}}, tell us your date of birth
complete.birthTitleAskName: {{name}}, what is your date of birth?
complete.genderTitle: Which gender do you identify with?
complete.genderSubtitle: We want to show you the right people.
complete.genderShowQuestion: Do you want gender to be shown on your profile?
complete.photosSubtitle: Your moment to shine: show the real you. Add 1–6 photos that say ‘this is me’.
complete.photosTipAvatarFirst: Put your best photo first — it's your avatar.
complete.photosTipVariety: Variety helps: close-up, full-body, and activities.
complete.photosTipSolo: Include solo photos to avoid group confusion.
complete.photosTipMin: Add 2 to start; with 4+ you stand out more.
complete.summarySubtitle: Take a quick look and make sure everything looks good
complete.promptsSubtitle: Answer a few to show your personality (optional)
complete.orientationSubtitle: To show you the right people, tell us who you're interested in.
complete.orientationVisibilityHint: You can decide if others see who you are interested in.
complete.genderVisibilityHint: You can also hide your gender.
complete.visibilityQuestion: Do you want this to be shown on your profile?
complete.hiddenNote: Fields marked as hidden won't appear on your public profile.
complete.seekingSubtitle: Choose one option (you can change it later)
complete.seekingHint: Helps us show you better matches
complete.promptsTitleFriendly: Tell us a bit about you
complete.promptsSubtitleFriendly: Pick things that describe you and you vibe with. No rush — it’s just so people get to know you.
complete.bioSubtitleFriendly: Add a short line that characterizes you. Brief but with personality.
complete.bioPlaceholderFriendly: E.g., Sunset chaser, weekend cycling and 90s movies.

profile.hub.subtitle: Manage and improve your profile from here
profile.hub.viewProfileDesc: Full view as others see it
profile.hub.promptsDesc: Answer prompts to show your personality
profile.hub.visibilityDesc: Decide what’s shown on your profile

welcome.title: Welcome to Wispic!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your profile in a few quick steps.
welcome.body: We'll just ask a few friendly things about you and a photo. Quick and easy!

permissions.title: Don't miss a thing!
permissions.subtitle: Choose which permissions and notifications to allow
permissions.msgDesc: Get notified when someone messages you
permissions.likesDesc: Get notified on likes and matches
permissions.notificationsDesc: Messages, likes and matches, and friend requests
permissions.locationDesc: Improve nearby results by allowing access to your location
permissions.cameraDesc: To take and upload photos to your profile
permissions.locationBlockedHint: To enable it, open system Settings and grant Location permission.

postsave.title: Your profile is ready!
postsave.subtitle: Go to the app or keep personalizing with text and optional questions.

congrats.title: Congrats!
congrats.body: Your profile is ready to shine. You can jump into the app now — and if you complete a couple more bits, your matches will get even better.

thanks.title: Thanks!
thanks.body: You’ve finished your profile. Jump into the app and start enjoying.
